name: One Drone
description:
A military drone that got out of control took everything into its electronic hands and began to complete the last task laid down in it! Destroy all enemy targets!

One Drone - A game with a side view, the player controls the drone, dodging enemy projectiles, objects and flying machines, along the way collecting bonus electronic chips that open up new opportunities for the drone and further progress!

Game Features:
- Bonus Weapons
- Beautiful Decoration
- Difficulty
